# deps/skia/src/pdf

set(SKIA_PDF_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/pdf")
# set(SKIA_PDF_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/pdf")

file(GLOB SKIA_PDF_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_PDF_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_PDF_SOURCES "${SKIA_PDF_DIR}/*.cpp")
# file(GLOB SKIA_PDF_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_PDF_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

# list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_PDF_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_PDF_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_PDF_SOURCES})

# set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
